CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(qtc_Ship_To_Account__c),'', qtc_Ship_To_Account__r.BillingStreet & BR() & qtc_Ship_To_Account__r.BillingCity & ","& " " & qtc_Ship_To_Account__r.BillingState & " " & qtc_Ship_To_Account__r.BillingPostalCode & BR() & qtc_Ship_To_Account__r.BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Ship To Site Address
